headline: GTA Online
subtitle: 2X GTA$ and RP on Offense Defense
content:
InÂ Offense Defense, each team consists of a Runner and a Blocker.

As a Runner, beat out the other teams to be first to the finish line, dodging enemy Blockers along the way. Blockers must try to run opposition players off course, while protecting their own Runner.

Win or lose, roll away with Double Rewards through March 1.
